metadata.title: In RA4E1 AI kit, what's the expected performance (resolution/FSP) of the TFT LCD considering no HMI capabilities?

sections.content:
Question:
In RA4E1 AI kit, what's the expected performance (resolution/FSP) of the TFT LCD considering no HMI capabilities?
Answer:
The communication to the display is over the SPI bus write 40MHz, read back 20MHz, 2.5MHz for the touch controller.
Suitable Products
AIK-RA4E1
